The elementary brand is unique: technica: The elementary brand is unique: technically it belongs to elementary LLC., the company that guides and supports development of elementary products. However, we have a great community and don’t want to be too overbearing with legal requirements and technicalities. As such, we have written up some guidelines to make it easier to understand when and how the elementary brand should be used.
Name: Pangalan
The word \"elementary\" refers to and is: The word "elementary" refers to and is a trademark of elementary LLC. elementary is always lower-case, even when beginning sentences such as this. It is also used along with product names (i.e. "elementary OS") to refer to a specific product of elementary.
elementary owns two marks: the \"element: elementary owns two marks: the "elementary" logotype and the "e" logomark. Both are considered trademarks and represent elementary—the company—and its products.
Both should be used with the following i: Both should be used with the following in mind:
Do not stretch, skew, rotate, flip, or o: Huwag pahabain, hiligin, paikutin, i-flip, o kung hindi man ay baguhin ang mga marka.
Do not use the marks on an overly-busy b: Do not use the marks on an overly-busy background; solid colors work best.
The marks should always be monochromatic: The marks should always be monochromatic; typically white if on a dark background, or black if on a light background.
The logotype is to be used when space al: The logotype is to be used when space allows to refer to elementary the company. It can be used before a product name to refer to a specific product of elementary.
The logotype should always be used under: The logotype should always be used under the following guidelines:
Do not attempt to recreate the logotype. It is a meticulously-designed brand mark, not simply "elementary" written in a specific font.
Do not use the logotype at small sizes;: Do not use the logotype at small sizes; if it is not clear, use the logomark instead.
The \"e\" logomark is to be used to refe: Ang "e" logomark ay para magamit sa pag-sangguni sa elementarya na kumpanya kapag space ay napilitan o isang parisukat ratio ay kinakailangan.
elementary employs the use of color comb: Ang elementary may karapatan sa paggamit ng mga kulay na sinamahan ng aming pangalan at mga marka upang maitaguyod ang aming tatak. Ginagamit namin ang mga sumusunod na paleta:
For web and print, we use Raleway for he: For web and print, we use Raleway for headings and Open Sans for body copy. For code blocks, we use Roboto Mono.
We encourage third party developers crea: We encourage third party developers creating products for elementary OS to adopt certain elements of the elementary brand to achieve consistency:
However, to avoid user confusion, we do: However, to avoid user confusion, we do restrict the usage of the elementary name and marks:
You are encouraged to say that your app: You are encouraged to say that your app or service is designed for elementary OS, but please don't use the elementary name or marks as part of the name of your company, application, product, service, or in any logo you create.
Only use the elementary name or marks to: Only use the elementary name or marks to refer to elementary LLC. or its products (i.e. elementary OS).
Community products (sites, fan clubs, et: Community products (sites, fan clubs, etc.) are encouraged to use the elementary Community logo:
This helps establish the product as part: This helps establish the product as part of the overall elementary community while reducing confusion that can arise from using the main logomark.
We do not typically allow our branding (: We do not typically allow our branding (including our name or brand marks) to be used on third-party merchandise.
Assets &amp; More Info: Mga Ari-arian at iba pang impormasyon
For further information regarding the us: Para sa karagdagang impormasyon tungkol sa paggamit ng pangalan ng elementarya, branding, at mga trademark, mangyaring mag-email brand@elementary.io.
